claim_text: Pam Bondi testified before the House Judiciary Committee on February 11, 2026.

claim_text: The Epstein Files Transparency Act (H.R. 4405) was enacted on November 19, 2025.

claim_text: DOJ announced publication of 3.5 million responsive pages related to Epstein files on January 30, 2026.

claim_text: AP reported Casey Wasserman would sell his talent agency after release of emails with Ghislaine Maxwell.

claim_text: Reuters reported DOJ sent lawmakers a Feb. 15, 2026 letter regarding Epstein-file redactions and said four newly discussed names were not directly tied to criminal activity in reviewed records.
notes: Reuters report citing Politico on DOJ letter language.

claim_text: AP reported Epstein invoked ties to Nobel committee leadership in outreach to high-profile contacts.
notes: Based on AP review of file excerpts and communications.

claim_text: AP reported some U.S. school districts canceled Lifetouch class-picture sessions after viral Epstein-related claims.
notes: AP coverage of school district responses to viral claims.
